articles.title: SBI customers alert! State Bank of India is giving instant Personal Loan of Rs 20 lakh to these account holders - DNA India
articles.description: SBI customers alert! State Bank of India is giving instant Personal Loan of Rs 20 lakh to these account holders -  The bank said that a SBI Salary Account holder can avail a loan of Rs 25,000 to Rs 20 lakh in this scheme.
